name: Parry
descr: Gives the ability to parry the melee and ranged physical attack's, when using a dual swords. With <font color=BDB76B>20% chance</font>, attack will be parryed and you get the "Prepare Stance" status for the next 3 seconds.

name: Triple Slasher
descr: Triple Slash ability is instantly reused after a successful parry.

name: Dual Wield
descr: Dual swords no longer share damage (50% from each), instead of it - they deal <font color=BDB76B>100% damage</font> from each weapon.

name: Disarm
descr: Attack which disarm the righ-hand weapon on enemy. When used in <font color=LEVEL>Parry Stance</font>, it blocks the ability to equip right-hand weapon. <font color=FFA500>Has hidden function.</font>

name: Confrontation
descr: When 2 or more enemies surrounds you, your attacking abilities increases.

name: Dual Redirection
descr: Ability that allows you to redirect the projectile spell to the selected target of your choice at this point, increasing it's damage by a force that additionally depends from your M.Atk. If there is no selected target, then you will receive damage which increased by your M.Atk.

name: Heavy Grip
descr: Reduce your P.Atk Speed by 15% but increase your resistance agains disarming by 100% and empowers you to summon Two-Handed Dual swords from ancient times in your both hands! <font color=FFA500>Has hidden function.</font>

name: Dual Sword Master
descr: Riposte stance not consume MP anymore and increase his effectivness by 50%.
